english: All of the students are looking forward to the four-day graduation trip to Kenting.
chinese: 所有的同學都非常期待去墾丁四天的畢業旅行

english: Whether it is a visit to Sun-Moon Lake or a tour in Kaohsiung, I will not miss out on the graduation trip.
chinese: 無論是去日月潭旅遊或是去高雄觀光，我絕不會錯過畢業旅行

english: Dressing up for the prom is one of the most unforgettable memories in high school for me.
chinese: 盛裝參加畢業舞會是我高中最難忘的回憶之一。

english: In the graduation ceremony, the principal said a lot of inspiring words to encourage the graduates to pursue their dreams.
chinese: 畢業典禮上校長說了很多激勵人心的話，去鼓勵畢業生追求夢想。

english: He said graduation is an important milestone in life other than getting a diploma.
chinese: 他說畢業除了拿到文憑之外，也是人生重要的里程碑。

english: To apply for the scholarship, you have to prepare a study plan and two recommendation letters.
chinese: 申請這獎學金，你必須準備好讀書計畫和兩封推薦信。

english: Only when you are fully prepared are you able to leave a deep impression on the professors.
chinese: 只有當你充分準備，才能夠讓大學教授留下深刻的印象。

english: What professors want to see from your academic portfolio is how much you explore your own interests, not how many extracurricular activities you have participated in.
chinese: 教授想從你的學習歷程檔案中看到的是你探索自己興趣的多少，而不是你參加了多少課外活動。。

english: College application is indeed a difficult process. Had it not been for my teacher’s advice, I might not have been able to rise to the challenge.
chinese: 申請大學過程的確很辛苦。要不是老師的建議，我可能無法成功面對挑戰。

english: Only by working hard and never giving up can you get admitted to your ideal college.
chinese: 只有藉由努力和永不放棄，才能進入你理想中的大學。

english: People generally consider it unhealthy to have night snacks before bedtime.
chinese: 一般認為睡前吃宵夜是不健康的。

english: When people are stressed, they eat comfort food, such as fried chicken or apple pies, to cope with negative feelings and improve their mood.
chinese: 人們壓力大時會吃像是炸雞和蘋果派等的安慰食品，來處理負面情緒和改善心情。

english: On special occasions, our family will dine out to celebrate.
chinese: 在特殊的場合，我們一家人會外出用餐來慶祝。

english: It is about time that I kicked my bad habit of oversleeping.
chinese: 該是我戒掉睡過頭的壞習慣的時候了。

english: John tended to oversleep in the morning and ended up having no time to freshen up and eat breakfast.
chinese: John早上往往睡過頭，而結果沒有時間梳洗和吃早餐。

english: He didn’t develop the good habit of keeping early hours until he started working.
chinese: 直到他開始工作，他才養成早睡早起的好習慣。
